item.title: USACO Party Lamps
item.author: Author
item.description: A set of \(N\) \((10 \le N \le 100)\) lamps, numbered from 1 to N. Four types of button: Button type Usage 1 flip all lamps (On to Off, Off to On) 2 flip odd numbered lamps (e.g. 1, 3, 5) 3 flip even numbered lamps (e.g. 2, 4, 6) 4 flip \(3k+1 ; with ; k \ge 0\) numbered lamps (e.
